data.eml:eml: Paramoguai kavieng, a new genus and species of camptandriid crab from Papua New Guinea (Crustacea: Brachyura)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ahyong, Shane T. (2014): Paramoguai kavieng, a new genus and species of camptandriid crab from Papua New Guinea (Crustacea: Brachyura). Zootaxa 3856 (4): 578-584, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3856.4.6
